```{r}
MTBE <- read.csv('MTBE.csv')
MTBE
```

```{r}
true = with(MTBE, MTBE$Aquifier == 'Bedrock' & MTBE$WellClass=='Private')
sum(true)/length(MTBE$Aquifier == 'Bedrock')
```

```{r}
pub = with(MTBE, MTBE$WellClass == 'Public')
sum(pub)/length(MTBE$WellClass == 'Bedrock')
```

```{r}
true = with(MTBE, MTBE$MTBE.Detect == 'Below Limit' & MTBE$WellClass=='Private')
sum(true)/length(true)
```
